original_solution_mapping.L2: So, he will need 50 / 5 = <<50/5=10>>10 days to finish all episodes he bought.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6298.
    Returns: the number of days Marc needs to finish all episodes.
    """
    # L1
    total_episodes = 50 # 50 episodes of the show
    fraction_watched_per_day = Fraction(1, 10) # 1/10 of the episodes he bought
    episodes_per_day = total_episodes * fraction_watched_per_day

    # L2
    days_to_finish = total_episodes / episodes_per_day

    # FA
    answer = days_to_finish
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: So, he will need {total_episodes} / {episodes_per_day} = <<{total_episodes}/{episodes_per_day}={days_to_finish}>>{days_to_finish} days to finish all episodes he bought.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So, he will need 50 / 500 = <<50/500=1/10>>1/10 days to finish all episodes he bought.

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '*' but used '/' instead.
